short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Video Downloader Pro helps you download online videos in various formats, such as m3u8, mp4, webm, etc., to your computer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Video Downloader Pro elevates the experience of downloading videos by instantly detecting video content on any webpage, allowing users to effortlessly download them directly to their computer. 

Our extension automatically identifies video files on a page and supports a wide array of formats, including m3u8, mp4, webm, and more, making it easier than ever to access your favorite content offline.

Our extension is perfect for students, professionals, and video content enthusiasts who need a convenient tool for saving videos for later viewing. 

If you value your time and want the ability to watch videos without an internet connection or don't want to be tied to online availability. With our extension, you can rest assured that your favorite videos are always at your fingertips.

Video Downloader Pro

- instantly finds videos on any webpage
- download videos in formats like m3u8, mp4, webm, and many others.
- video downloading is done with a single click.
- watch your favorite videos anytime, even without internet access.
- enjoy fast video downloading without delays.

Video Downloader Pro is a powerful tool that will make your online experience even more enjoyable and convenient. 

Don't miss the chance to enhance your video downloading process.

Download now and start enjoying your favorite video content anytime, anywhere!

Video Downloader Pro is not a Youtube Downloader. Due to restrictions of the Google Web Store Policies and Developer Program Policies we can not download Youtube Videos. Thank you for understanding.

Our extension is in a partnership with Admitad (https://admitad.com/). We use this service only for link affilication. We DO NOT save any of your search queries nor are we making any rewards from your search queries.

We can receive a reward for sales that happen after users click on the affiliate links.

You can learn more about the process in Admitad's privacy policy at https://terms.admitad.com/en/privacy-policy/for-end-users/. The ads associated with this partnership do not interfere with any third-party website, in-app, or native advertising in any way.
